paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 4% of African Americans in the US

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile mutation is associated with cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, associated with disease in affected individuals.
variants.population_frequency: 4% in African Americans in the US
variants.source_location: Main Text, Transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis (ATTR-CA) section
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is one of over 90 identified in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: The Val122Ile mutation is present in 4% of African Americans in the US, and causes predominately CA.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is known to cause familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, associated with disease in affected individuals.
variants.source_location: Main Text, Transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis (ATTR-CA) section
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is one of over 90 identified in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: The Val30Met mutation causes familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

patients.phenotype: may be seen in younger CA patients

functional_data.summary: The Thr60Ala mutation may be associated with younger patients presenting with cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, associated with disease in affected individuals.
variants.source_location: Main Text, Transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis (ATTR-CA) section
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is one of over 90 identified in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: The Thr60Ala is found in Northern Ireland, and may be seen in younger CA patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant variants in the TTR gene were extracted successfully.
